alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 10 at 3:25AM PDT until April 12 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 3 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts 60 to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes, Owens Valley and White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to 3 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...High winds can topple trees...down power lines...and remove shingles or blow weakened roofs off buildings.Travel will be difficult and dangerous along sections of Highway 395 in the Owens Valley, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans...lawn furniture...and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Drivers of vans...campers...trailers...and other high profile vehicles should be alert to the danger of these winds. Use extra caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County
